With Chevy Chase leading the way and plenty of hilarious mishaps, it's sure to bring some laughs and cheer to your holiday season.

I see you're looking for a superhero fix! Since you didn't expect that vibe from Unbreakable, I'll suggest two alternatives.

If you enjoyed the origin story and action-packed adventure in Unbreakable, you might enjoy "The Amazing Spider-Man" (2012). This movie follows Peter Parker's transformation into Spider-Man as he battles a mysterious reptilian foe. The film features Andrew Garfield and Emma Stone, who bring their A-game to the iconic characters.

Alternatively, if you're open to exploring other superhero movies, I recommend "Spider-Man 2" (2004). This installment delves deeper into Peter Parker's personal struggles as he faces off against Otto Octavius, a complex villain. Tobey Maguire and Kirsten Dunst reprise their roles in this thrilling sequel.

Which one piques your interest?
